refnamediv.refpurpose: Puts the value of the instrument's internal tie-in flag into the named i-rate variable.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Puts the value of the instrument's internal tie-in flag into the named i-rate variable.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: Puts the value of the instrument's internal tie-in flag into the named i-rate variable. Assigns 1 if this note has been tied onto a previously held note (see i statement); assigns 0 if no tie actually took place. (See also tigoto.)
